com.github.sanity4j.maven.plugin

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.maven.plugin.Coordinate

  • public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    A Maven Coordinate. A Coordinate can be constructed by parsing a String of the form: 
    
 [groupId:]artifactId[:version][:packaging][:classifier][:scope]
    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.1.1
    Author:
    Darian Bridge.

    • Constructor Summary

      Copy Constructor.
      Coordinate(java.lang.String line)
      Construct a Coordinate by parsing the specified line and/or file.
